title: 08/02 Football: Celebrity NFL Insiders, Sean Payton In Trouble This Season?
description:
On a Wednesday edition of the Pick Six Podcast, Nick Kostos and Will Brinson make sense of training camp injuries: Sterling Shepard (:55), Will Fuller (3:15), Forrest Lamp (9:50) and almost every player on the Ravens (11:55). Speaking of the Ravens: will this be John Harbaugh's last year as their coach (13:20)? And will they sign Colin Kaepernick (17:20)? The guys applaud celebrity NFL insider Guy Fieri (25:00) and, inspired by Jamal Adams, reveal their desired manner of death (27:30). Pete Prisco joins live from Saints camp (36:55) and talks Adrian Peterson (41:25), Sean Payton's job status (44:15) and the greatness of Drew Brees (48:20). The gang closes by talking about poor airline etiquette that drives them insane.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
